metadata.title: CVE-2022-38851 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Readvia function read_meta_record() of mplayer/libmpdemux/asfheader.c. Thisaffects mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1').
